articles.title: Meeting Held to Welcome Songjin Steel Complex Delegation
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Welcome Songjin Steel Complex Delegation
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Friday to welcome the delegation of workers and technicians of the Songjin Steel Complex who completed the Korean-style system for the production of Juche iron true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meeting were senior party, army and state officials and people from all walks of life in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, read out a joint congratulatory message sent by the WPK Central Committee and the DPRK National Defence Commission to the workers, technicians and officials of the Songjin Steel Complex. 
					
					 The message noted that the big success made in creating the iron- and steel-making method of Korean-style is tantamount to a shining victory of Kim Il Sung's unique idea of producing Juche iron and marks a great auspicious event for all the people and the whole state, a product of the inexhaustible mental power of the workers of Songgang boundlessly faithful to the party and the leader. This is entirely ascribable to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's firm faith and noble sense of moral obligation, rare wisdom and outstanding leadership to solve 100 per cent what the President planned and desired in his lifetime, the message noted, adding:
					
					 The above-said spectacular success represents a great victory of the immortal Juche idea and a great demonstration of the national power more striking than the conduct of the third nuclear test.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, in his welcome report said that the WPK and the country and its people will always remember the heroic exploit the workers of Songgang have performed by establishing an iron production process entirely relying on Juche iron and turning out iron and steel in full capacity, thereby successfully materializing the behests of the President. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting stressed that their indomitable revolutionary spirit and work-style serve as an example to be followed by all the people in the on-going general offensive.
					
					 Ri Chol Ho, manager of the Songjin Steel Complex, in his speech said that the complex would boost the production of quality steel and ensure its supply to all fields of national economy and thus proudly participate in the great festival celebrating the 65th birthday of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Spread to Centenarian
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A birthday spread sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il was conveyed to woman centenarian Jang Son Nyo residing in Kumsan-dong, Sunchon City, South Phyongan Province.
					 Undergoing the bitter sorrow over being a member of the stateless nation in the distress-torn period, she could not lead a true life till President Kim Il Sung liberated the country. 
					
					 She worked hard for the agricultural production with her single desire to repay the benevolence shown by the Workers' Party of Korea and the President for her. She had kept herself busy even after she became a pensioner.
					
					 She is leading an optimistic life in good health, having balanced diet.

articles.title: Eleventh Scenic Spot of Songun Era
articles.content:
Eleventh Scenic Spot of Songun Era
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm has come into being in Wonhung area in Samsok District, Pyongyang.
					 Until last year, the area had remained a small rural community consisting of a few outdated villages with a zigzag river and uneven paddy and dry fields.
					
					 In a matter of less than a year, the villages have all moved and nestled under a hill, the river course changed, a large hill totally disappeared and the patches turned into a large-scale orchard.
					
					 Long-stretching lines of fruit trees and some 20-kilometer-long pavements between the large-sized standardized fields look perfect and faultless in all aspects.
					
					 The community is now furnished with modern dwelling houses where food is prepared with the help of methane gas, a gymnasium as modern as those in towns, garages full of vehicles, a large fruit depot and a fruit processing factory.
					
					 Astonishingly enough, fruits have already been gathered from trees planted in March this year.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the farm and enjoyed a bird's-eye view of the orchard with pleasure. Taking an appetizing apple weighing 550g in his hand, he said Korea has one more pride, the eleventh scenic spot of the Songun era, this year when the Korean people's dreams have come true.

articles.title: Treasured Sword for Victory of Revolutionary Cause
articles.content:
Treasured Sword for Victory of Revolutionary Cause
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean servicepersons and people are now bringing about a new great revolutionary upsurge in their efforts to build a great, prosperous and powerful country on the land of Kim Il Sung Korea under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il, through his uninterrupted inspection tours of army units and on-the-spot guidance to economic sectors throughout the country, has encouraged all the servicepersons and people to fully display their spiritual strength in the building of a powerful country, indicating ways of making a great leap forward and innovations.
					
					 In the days of building a strong economy the Korean people's politico-ideological traits of deeply revering and devotedly defending the leadership of the revolution have been manifested on a higher level.
					
					 This year's drive of the Korean people for a great upsurge is not just for an economic revitalization but for defending the leadership of the revolution and safeguarding their ideology, social system and cause.
					
					 The Korean people, with a strong will to carry forward through generations the spirit of devotedly defending the leader displayed by anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk, have made world-startling miracles and changes in their efforts for a new great upsurge under unprecedentedly difficult conditions.
					
					 Production has been increased considerably in all sectors of the heavy industry including the four key sectors of the national economy, machine-building, chemical and building-material industries. In particular, the defense industry, a pillar of the self-supporting socialist economy, has registered great successes, a good omen for building a thriving nation, and the metallurgical industry has witnessed such a great event as the completion of a Juche-oriented iron production system.
					
					 The "Huichon Speed", a speed of the drive for a great upsurge, has been created in major projects including the Huichon Power Station, the Kumyagang Power Station, the Orangchon Power Station and the gasification of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, and Mansudae Street, the Taedonggang Tile Factory and other monumental edifices of the Songun era have sprouted up in different parts of the country.
					
					 The foundation and potentiality for consumer goods production have been further cemented and increased, great achievements gained in the efforts for putting the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis and a rapid development brought about in all scientific and technological sectors including the space field.
					
					 All the successes made by the Korean people this year have fully demonstrated to the world the indomitable conviction and will of the heroic people united in one mind around the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					The Korean army and people will accomplish the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation without fail, conveying down through generations the immortal revolutionary feats
						 Kim Jong Suk performed in leaving to the Korean nation the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, a treasured sword for the victory of the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause, as their everlasting property.

articles.title: Meeting for Start of Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Meeting for Start of Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Seventy-eight years has passed since the winter Mingyuegou meeting was held, bringing about the beginning of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 In those days the Japanese imperialists were intensifying an all-out reactionary offensive against the Korean people for "secure rear" along with the start of continental aggression.
					
					 The prevailing situation raised an urgent need to fight the counterrevolutionary armed force with revolutionary one.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung convened a meeting of cadres of the Party and the Young Communist League in Mingyuegou, Yanji County in December Juche 20 (1931) to arouse the Korean revolutionaries and people to an anti-Japanese armed struggle. 
					
					 He made a historic speech "On Organizing and Waging Armed Struggle against Japanese Imperialism" at the meeting.
					
					 In the speech he, with an analysis of the internal and external situation created owing to the Manchurian occupation by the Japanese imperialists and a historical lesson drawn from the anti-Japanese national liberation movement of the Korean people, advanced a strategic policy of launching an armed struggle mainly on the basis of guerrilla war.
					
					 He said that for this purpose, it was necessary for the Korean people, first of all, to organize an anti-Japanese people's guerrilla army, their own armed force capable of defeating the counterrevolutionary force of the enemy. He then clarified its character and mission as well as principles and ways of organizing and strengthening it.  
					
					 He underlined the necessity of guerrilla bases and gave perfect answers to questions arising in their establishment, saying that broad segments of people should be educated and united and the revolutionary force trained and expanded in a militant way through practice to provide a mass foundation of the armed struggle.
					
					 He also referred to an issue of forming an anti-Japanese united front of the Korean and Chinese people.
					
					 He stressed that the work of the Party and Young Communist League organizations should be strengthened in order to successfully carry out the tasks arising in waging an anti-Japanese armed struggle. 
					
					 After the meeting the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle of Korea entered a new, higher level, namely the stage of an armed struggle.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Brazilian Figure
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Party for Free Motherland of Brazil could learn from the precious experience and work style gained by the Workers' Party of Korea in the struggle for achieving the independence of the popular masses, while developing the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK, said Sergio Rubens De Araujo Torres, chairman of the party, when meeting the DPRK ambassador to Brazil who paid a courtesy call on him on Dec. 14.
					 The chairman stressed that his party would as ever express full support and solidarity with the fraternal Korean people in their just cause of building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the country's reunification and struggle alongside the WPK in the joint struggle against the U.S. imperialism and its lackeys.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Marked
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given in Romania and a film show was held in Germany and a photo exhibition and film show took place in Iran from Dec. 18 to 20 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Displayed in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos on the exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association praised Kim Jong Suk for having performed great exploits for national liberation and the building of a new country and provided a sure guarantee for carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il has bolstered up the Korean revolutionary armed forces as an invincible army with his unique Songun politics, putting the national power on the highest level, and gave field guidance to the Chollima Steel Complex in December last year, lighting a torch for a new great revolutionary surge, he expressed belief that the Korean people would fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea.
					
					 The manager of the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm noted that the undying exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries and independence against imperialism and the U.S. would be always remembered by the Iranian people.
					
					The strength of the DPRK has grown remarkably stronger under the Songun leadership of 
						Kim Jong Il, he said, adding that the Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" shows the firm will and resolution of the Korean people to build a thriving nation without fail.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the function in Germany.

articles.title: Branch of Mexican Kimilsungism Committee Inaugurated
articles.content:
Branch of Mexican Kimilsungism Committee Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The San Luis Potosi branch of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism was inaugurated with due ceremony on Dec. 17.
					 On display in the venue of the inaugural ceremony were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and publications introducing Songun Korea.
					
					The president of the committee, addressing the ceremony, referred to the significance of the inauguration of the branch and spoke highly of the Songun revolutionary leadership feats Kim Jong Il has performed by firmly protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation while foiling the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The activities to study and disseminate the Juche idea are getting brisk in many countries of the world including those in Latin America, he said, adding that the validity and vitality of the Juche idea have been fully proved in the DPRK and that the organizations for the study of the Juche idea in Mexico have studied and disseminated this great idea in various forms and by diverse methods.
					
					 Jose de Jesus Galvan Pozos was elected chief of the branch.

articles.title: Jang Son Nyo recibe mesa de festin por su centenario
articles.content:
Jang Son Nyo recibe mesa de festin por su centenario
 Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio alimentos para preparar la mesa de festin dedicada al centenario de la anciana Jang Son Nyo, moradora del barrio de Kumsan de la ciudad de Sunchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					 En el periodo de martirio nacional (durante el coloniaje japones sobre Corea), esa longeva vivia sufriendo en carne propia todas las desdichas de apatrida. Desde cuando el Presidente Kim Il Sung libero la patria, ella comenzo a vivir dignamente.
					
					  Con el unico deseo de compensar los grandes beneficios del partido y el lider, ella vino trabajando sinceramente para la produccion agricola y no dejo de hacerlo aun despues de jubilarse.
					
					 La anciana lleva una vida optimista sin recurrir nunca a la dieta desequilibrada.

articles.title: "Onceno paisaje del Songun"
articles.content:
"Onceno paisaje del Songun"
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Un paisaje de frutos, paraiso de la gran potencia prospera, se extendio en la zona de Wonhung del municipio de Samsok de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					Hasta el ano pasado, este lugar fue un area pequena compuesta de riachuelo tortuoso,  altos o bajos arrozales, campos secanos y algunos poblados atrasados.
					
					Pero, durante menos de un ano toda la aldea se mudo al pie de la montana, se cambio el curso del riachuelo, desaparecio un gran monte y las parcelas pequenas se convirtieron en un huerto frutal de gran dimension.
					
					Son absolutamente perfectos los arboles frutales alineados, la carretera pavimentada de mas de 50 ries (10 ri equivalen a 4 kilometros) por donde se puede ir y venir libremente entre los huertos frutales y las parcelas estandarizadas.
					
					Son maravillosos la aldea frutal donde fueron construidas las viviendas modernas en que cuecen el arroz con el metano, el gimnasio a ser envidiado por los urbanos, los garajes llenos de medios de transporte, el almacen de frutos de gran tamano y la fabrica de elaboracion de frutos.
					
					Los arboles frutales, plantados en marzo de este ano, ya echaron gordas ramillas que eran posibles  despues de 4 anos de su trasplante, florecieron y  dieron los frutos apetitosos.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito a este lugar donde  vio jubilosamente tal paisaje y, tocando una manzana apetitosa que pesa 550g senalo que ha surgido el "Onceno paisaje del Songun", otro orgullo de Corea.
					
					 Este paisaje, nombre de nueva epoca en el ano en curso cuando se realiza el ideal, es el jubilo y la gran alegria de Corea.

articles.title: Defensa a ultranza al lider es victoria de causa revolucionaria
articles.content:
Defensa a ultranza al lider es victoria de causa revolucionaria
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Hoy en dia, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea bajo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea registran un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario para poner la placa de la gran potencia prospera en Corea de Kim Il Sung.
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il ilumina con claridad el camino para crear salto e innovacion a traves de las incesantes inspecciones legendarias al frente y direcciones sobre el terreno a todas las partes del pais e hizo poner de pleno manifiesto la fuerza espiritual de todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Los rasgos ideo-politicos del pueblo coreano que defiende a costa de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion anorandola ardientemente en los dias de la construccion de la potencia economica se han manifestado sin reserva en la altura mas sublime.
					
					La lucha de este ano del pueblo coreano por producir el gran auge fue el combate a vida o muerte no solo por activar la  economia sino que tambien por defender la Direccion de la Revolucion, nuestra idea, regimen y causa.
					
					Con la firme conviccion y la voluntad de heredar de generacion en generacion el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider demostrado por la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, el pueblo coreano logro el milagro y el cambio seculares produciendo un nuevo y gran auge en las condiciones dificiles y arduas sin precedentes.
					
					Resono energicamente el canonazo de la victoria que toca a las puertas de la gran potencia prospera en el sector de la industria de defensa nacional, pilar de la economia independiente socialista y se  perfecciono el sistema de produccion de hierro Juche que es un gran evento en la industria metalurgica.  Y se aumento considerablemente la produccion en los 4 sectores de vanguardia de la economia nacional y el sector de la industria pesada en su conjunto que forma las arterias principales de la economia del pais como las industrias de maquinaria, quimica y materiales de construccion, etc.
					
					En las obras de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon, la de Kumyagang, la de Orangchon, la obra del objeto de gasificacion de Namhung y otros objetos importantes se han creado la nueva "velocidad de Huichon", la de marcha de gran auge y fueron construidas por doquier las creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Songun incluyendo la Avenida Mansudae y la Fabrica de Azulejos Taedonggang.
					
					Se han fortalecido mas la base y la potencialidad para la produccion de articulos de consumo popular, logrado el gran avance en las labores para realizar la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de la economia nacional y desarrollado rapidamente la ciencia y tecnica en su conjunto como la tecnologia espacial.
					
					A traves de la victoria en las campanas de este ano se demostraron patentemente a todo el mundo la indoblegable conviccion y voluntad del heroico pueblo coreano unido monoliticamente en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea lograran sin falta la causa de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera transmitiendo eternamente las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias de la Heroina
						 Kim Jong Suk quien dejo como herencia eterna de la nacion coreana el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider, invencible remedio con que puede ganar la victoria la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Conferencia de Mingyuegou da inicio a la lucha armada antijaponesa
articles.content:
Conferencia de Mingyuegou da inicio a la lucha armada antijaponesa
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Transcurrieron 78 anos desde la Conferencia de Mingyuegou de invierno que dio inicio a la lucha armada antijaponesa.
					En aquel entonces, al lanzar la agresion al continente asiatico, el imperialismo japones recrudecio en todos los sentidos la ofensiva reaccionaria contra el pueblo coreano para la "seguridad de retaguardia".
					
					La situacion dada urgia luchar con las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias frente a las contrarrevolucionarias.
					
					Para incorporar a los revolucionarios y otros habitantes de Corea en la lucha armada antijaponesa, el Presidente Kim Il Sung convoco en diciembre del 20 (1931) de la Era Juche en Mingyuegou del distrito de Yanji la conferencia de cuadros del partido y de la Union de la Juventud Comunista (UJC).
					
					En su discurso historico pronunciado en la ocasion "Acerca de la organizacion y el desarrollo de la lucha armada contra el imperialismo japones", el analizo la situacion interna y externa del pais creada por la ocupacion de Manchuria por el imperialismo japones y la leccion historica del movimiento antijapones de la liberacion nacional del pueblo coreano y presento la orientacion estrategica de librar la lucha armada tomando como su principal modo el combate de guerrillas.
					
					Senalo que para ponerla en practica, hay que organizar primero la Guerrilla Popular Antijaponesa, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias capaces de aniquilar a las contrarrevolucionarias de los enemigos, y definio sus caracteristicas y mision, los principios de organizacion y los remedios concretos para fortalecerla.
					
					Tras destacar la necesidad de la fundacion de la base de guerrilla y dar perfectas respuestas a los problemas que se presentan en esta labor, indico que se debe intensificar de continuo las labores encaminadas a educar y unir a amplias masas populares, formar de modo combativo y ampliar en las practicas las fuerzas revolucionarias para que la lucha armada gane terreno entre las masas.
					
					Igualmente, enseno la tarea de formar el frente unido antijapones entre los pueblos coreano y chino.
					
					Prosiguio que deben fortalecer las labores de las organizaciones del partido y de la UJC para cumplir con exito las tareas que se presentan en organizar y librar la lucha armada antijaponesa.
					
					Con motivo de la Conferencia de Mingyuegou, la lucha de la liberacion nacional antijaponesa de Corea se situo a la nueva etapa de lucha armada.
